testCases.title: Admin User Can Access Admin Area
testCases.description: Verify that users in the 'Admins' Cognito group can access the admin section.
preconditions: User is logged in with an admin account (member of 'Admins' group in cognito)
testSteps: Start on dashboard of signed in user
From dashboard, click "Admin Area" in sidenav
Verify admin page content is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Admin user sees the admin section with "Admin Access Only" heading.

testCases.title: Non-Admin User Cannot Access Admin Area
testCases.description: Verify that regular users cannot access the admin section.
preconditions: User is logged in with a non-admin account
testSteps: Start on dashboard of normal user
Verify "Admin Area" is not present in sidebar navigation
Verify access is denied or redirected
testCases.expectedResult: Non-admin user is redirected away from admin section or sees access denied message.

testCases.title: View Admin Dashboard
testCases.description: Verify admin dashboard displays relevant admin information.
preconditions: User is logged in as admin
testSteps: Start on dashboard page for logged in admin user
testCases.expectedResult: Admin sees admin-specific dashboard content.

testCases.title: Admin User Management
testCases.description: Verify admins can view/manage users or acount management capabilities.
preconditions: User is logged in as admin
testSteps: Start on dashboard page for logged in admin account
Verify user account modification is successful
testCases.expectedResult: Admin can view and manage users account information

testCases.title: Navigate to Sign-In Page
testCases.description: Verify that users can navigate from the landing page to the sign-in page.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the sign-in page with "Please sign in to continue." heading.

testCases.title: Sign-In with Valid Credentials
testCases.description: Verify that users can successfully sign in with valid email and password.
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to /dashboard and sees "Your Dashboard" heading.

testCases.title: Sign-Out from Dashboard
testCases.description: Verify that logged-in users can sign out successfully.
preconditions: User is logged in and on dashboard
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to /auth/login and sees sign-in form.

testCases.title: Sign-In with Invalid Credentials
testCases.description: Verify that sign-in fails with incorrect credentials and displays appropriate error.
testCases.expectedResult: User remains on login page with error message displayed.

testCases.title: Navigate to Sign-Up Page
testCases.description: Verify that users can navigate to the sign-up page from login.
testSteps: Click "Don't have an account? Sign up." link
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the sign-up form.

testCases.title: Sign-Up with Valid Information
testCases.status: Skipped don't feel like creating new account with emails or removing test account in cognito
testCases.description: Verify that new users can create an account.
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to confirm signup page.

testCases.title: Unauthenticated Access to Dashboard Redirects to Login
testCases.description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes.
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to login page.

testCases.title: Authenticated Access to Login Redirects to Dashboard
testCases.description: Verify that authenticated users are redirected away from auth pages.
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to dashboard.

testCases.title: Navigate to Journal Page
testCases.description: Verify that authenticated users can view loaded entries
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the journal page with existing entries.

testCases.title: Navigate to New Journal Entry Page
testCases.description: Verify that users can navigate to create a new journal entry.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the new journal entry form.

testCases.title: Create New Journal Entry
testCases.description: Verify that users can create a new journal entry.
testSteps: Verify redirect to journal page or entry detail
testCases.expectedResult: New journal confirmation message is shown

testCases.title: Create Journal Entry with Empty Content
testCases.description: Verify that journal creation validates required fields.
testCases.expectedResult: Form validation prevents creation without required content.

testCases.title: Create only one journal entry per day
testCases.description: Verify that user is limited to a single entry per calendar day
preconditions: journal entry exists on day that needs duplicate
testSteps: Attempt to submit form for exact same date
Verify validation error with description message
testCases.expectedResult: Form validation prevents multiple entry creation on same date

testCases.title: View Journal Entry
testCases.description: Verify that users can view an individual journal entry.
preconditions: At least one journal entry exists
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the full journal entry content.

testCases.title: Edit Journal Entry
testCases.description: Verify that users can edit an existing journal entry.
preconditions: At least one journal entry exists
testCases.expectedResult: Journal entry is updated with new content.

testCases.title: Delete Journal Entry
testCases.description: Verify that users can delete a journal entry.
preconditions: At least one journal entry exists
testCases.expectedResult: Journal entry is deleted and removed from the journal page.

testCases.title: Journal Entries Display in reverse Chronological Order
testCases.description: Verify that journal entries are displayed in correct order.
testSteps: Verify entries are sorted by date (newest first or as designed)
testCases.expectedResult: Journal entries appear in chronological order.

testCases.title: Navigate to Lists Page
testCases.description: Verify that authenticated users can navigate to the lists page.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the lists page with existing lists.

testCases.title: Navigate to New List Page
testCases.description: Verify that users can navigate to create a new list.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the new list creation form.

testCases.title: Create New List
testCases.description: Verify that users can create a new list.
testSteps: Verify redirect to new list or lists page
Verify new list appears in list
testCases.expectedResult: New list is created and visible in the lists page.

testCases.title: Create List with Empty Name
testCases.description: Verify that list creation requires a name.
testCases.expectedResult: Form validation prevents creation without a name.

testCases.title: View List Details
testCases.description: Verify that users can view an individual list.
testSteps: Verify list details page is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the list with its tasks.

testCases.title: Delete List
testCases.description: Verify that users can delete a list.
testSteps: Navigate to a list detail page
testCases.expectedResult: List is deleted and removed from the lists page.

testCases.title: Pin List to Sidebar
testCases.description: Verify that users can pin a list to the sidebar.
preconditions: At least one unpinned list exists
testSteps: Verify list appears in sidebar under "Pinned Lists"
testCases.expectedResult: List appears in the sidebar pinned lists section.

testCases.title: Unpin List from Sidebar
testCases.description: Verify that users can unpin a list from the sidebar.
preconditions: At least one pinned list exists
testSteps: In sidebar, click unpin button on a pinned list
Verify list is removed from pinned section
testCases.expectedResult: List is removed from the sidebar pinned lists section.

testCases.title: Links functional on dashboard page
testCases.description: Verify that
preconditions: User is logged in with an admin account (member of 'Admins' group in cognito)
testSteps: Start on dashboard of signed in user
From dashboard, check links in sidebar
testCases.expectedResult: Admin user sees the admin section with "Admin Access Only" heading.

testCases.title: Navigate through main pages
testCases.description: Verify that main page navigation works and pages load
preconditions: User is logged in with an admin account (member of 'Admins' group in cognito)
testSteps: Start on dashboard of signed in user
testCases.expectedResult: Admin user is able to navigate through main pages and each page loads

testCases.title: Navigate to Profile Settings
testCases.description: Verify that authenticated users can navigate to their profile settings page from sidebar.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the profile settings page with all settings sections visible.

testCases.title: View Profile Information
testCases.description: Verify that user profile page is accessible from the header icon
testCases.expectedResult: Profile page is accessible from header gear icon

testCases.title: Update Name of user
testCases.description: Verify that user is able to update their username from the profile setting page
testSteps: Input generated random name in username field
Return to profile and reset name
testCases.expectedResult: Username successfully updates and is visible on other pages

testCases.title: blank field does not update username
testCases.description: Verify that users cannot have a blank username
testSteps: Sign out and sign in with new password
testCases.expectedResult: Error message apears notifying user that blank field does not work

testCases.title: Change Timezone
testCases.description: Verify that users can change their timezone setting.
testCases.expectedResult: Timezone preference is updated.

testCases.title: Change theme settings
testCases.description: Verify that users can change accent color.
testCases.expectedResult: Application uses selected accent color.

testCases.title: Change notification settings
testCases.description: Verify that users can toggle different notification settings.
testCases.expectedResult: Users are able to select notification setting that they desire

testCases.title: Add task to List
testCases.description: Verify that users can add items to a list.
testCases.expectedResult: New item is added and visible in the list.

testCases.title: Complete List Item
testCases.description: Verify that users can mark list items as complete.
preconditions: A list with at least one item exists
testSteps: Navigate to a list with items
Click checkbox or complete button on an item
Verify item is marked as complete
testCases.expectedResult: Item shows as completed (checked/strikethrough).

testCases.title: Delete List Item
testCases.description: Verify that users can delete list items.
preconditions: A list with at least one item exists
testSteps: Navigate to a list with items
Verify item is removed from list
testCases.expectedResult: Item is deleted and no longer visible.

testCases.title: Edit List Item
testCases.description: Verify that users can edit list item text.
preconditions: A list with at least one item exists
testSteps: Navigate to a list with items
testCases.expectedResult: Item text is updated with new value.
